Description_lang: The Underpin diverts his mech's energy to shields, powering it down while it attempts to recharge absorbing $s3% of health in damage while the shields hold but taking $s6% increased damage while powered down. If Underpin successfully recharges his mech heals for $1214060s1%.
AuraDescription_lang: Absorbs $w1 damage.Damage taken increased by $s6%.Heals for $1214060s1% upon successfully recharging.
